feat: Epic 1-7 implementation - relationships architecture, AI coaches, wrapped analytics

Major architectural refactoring from single-analysis app to multi-relationship management platform:

## Epic 1: Relationships-Based Architecture
- Migrate from one-off file analysis to persistent relationship entities
- Add relationship management (create, view, archive, delete)
- Implement analysis history per relationship with aggregate statistics
- Create new types: Relationship, Analysis, AppData, RelationshipType

## Epic 2-3: Enhanced Results & Psychology
- Add psychological profiles with Big Five personality traits
- Implement detailed metrics with trend indicators
- Create timeline visualization with emotional impact
- Add in-depth explanation modals for complex insights

## Epic 4: AI Coach System
- Implement 4 personalized AI coaches (Christie, Grace, Ethan, Tabitha)
- Add coach selection UI with personality cards
- Integrate coach preferences into user profile

## Epic 7: Dating Wrapped
- Implement year-in-review "Wrapped" feature
- Add statistics: top moments, mood analysis, peak hours
- Create animated slideshow presentation
- Generate shareable highlights

## Infrastructure Changes
- Add figma_app as separate Next.js service (port 3100)
- Update docker-compose.yml with figma-app service
- Enhance start.sh with --figma-only flag
- Add 40+ new React components for new features

## TypeScript Fixes
- Fix all 15 compilation errors
- Add proper type definitions for shadcn/ui components
- Correct UnifiedMessage imports from @/types/index
- Add missing component props interfaces
